ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: This example shows persistence of old traces giving a 'ghosted' effect. As new series are drawn older series are made increasingly transparent until they become invisible. This example uses a background-thread Timer with variable interval of 20ms - 500ms to demonstrate the effect.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
This example shows persistence of old traces giving a 'ghosted' effect. As new series are drawn older series are made increasingly transparent until they become invisible.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
This example looks a lot better using the new [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Drawing~SciChart.Drawing.HighQualityRasterizer.HighQualityRenderSurface.html']HighQualityRenderSurface[/url] due to its superior handling of transparency. For maximum performance use the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#Enabling%20The%20Visual%20Xccelerator%20Engine.html']Visual Xccelerator Engine[/url].
